summary: The TES: Arena Protagonist follower: Talin, The Eternal Champion
descriptionHtml:
He has... issues... Like, he is usually only spawnable through console commands

(To spawn him, type Player.Placeatme 3c010003 OR 3f010003)
((3c010003 spawns him naked, 3f010003 spawns him in companion armor
Liked TES: Arena? Then this is the mod for you! Have The Eternal Champion as your follower!

Mods needed for this: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=145464037 and http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127279472

Recommended Mods: steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1415880 and http://modsreloaded.com/cloaks-of-skyrim


I have also included the Silver Knight Mod, and The Light Sword Mod.

THIS CHARACTER IS OVERPOWERED, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. (Reason he is so powerful is because Skyrim is Post-Arena, The Eternal Champion is most likely at Tiber Septim's level at this point.)
author: Darskul
